# Citing this book  {.unnumbered}

The source material for this book is located on GitHub:

[https://github.com/SPAAM-community/intro-to-ancient-metagenomics-book](https://github.com/SPAAM-community/intro-to-ancient-metagenomics-book).

Introduction to Ancient Metagenomics (Edition 2024). Zenodo. DOI: [10.5281/zenodo.8027280](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8027280)
